mapper.insert: insert into goods (goodsCatNum, goodsColor, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsSeq) values(#{goodsCatNum},#{goodsColor},#{goodsName},#{goodsPrice},#{goodsSeq})
mapper.select: select goodsNum, goodsCatNum, goodsColor, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsSeq from goods Where goodsNum=#{goodsNum}
select goodsNum, g.goodsCatNum, goodsColor, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsSeq from goods g, goods_cat gc where gc.posNum=#{posNum} and gc.goodsCatNum=g.goodsCatNum order by goodsNum desc
select goodsNum, goodsCatNum, goodsColor, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsSeq from goods
